description: Implement Progress as compound component (~120 lines) combining ProgressBar + Meter. Includes: Progress root, Progress.Bar (linear indicator), Progress.Label, Progress.Value (percentage display). Uses Object.assign pattern, frozen B constant with CSS variable slots, indeterminate state support, value formatting, useTooltip integration, and data-* attributes (data-indeterminate, data-value). Reference: RAC ProgressBar + Meter docs.
title: Progress compound component
